useCase.name: Register Player
useCase.description: Register a new player in the system with basic initialization.

successEndConditions.condition: Player successfully created in the system with basic setup.

failureEndConditions.condition: Player registration failed due to invalid input data.

mainSequence.step: User initializes basic setup through the Game interface.
Game creates a new player using the provided username information.
Player is instantiated with the provided name and starting credits.
Credits system initializes the new player with the provided credits.
